components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: Issue with Shortened Link Callback Events

incident_updates.body: We are seeing recovery in issue with Shortened Link Callback Events using Messaging Services. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available
We are investigating an issue with delay in Shortened Link Callback Events using Messaging Services. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with delay in Callback Events. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to CTBC Celular Network in Brazil

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to CTBC Celular network in Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to CTBC Celular network in Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to CTBC Celular network in Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to observe recovery in APNS push notifications payloads from Conversations. We'll continue monitoring for some time to ensure service stability. We'll provide an update in 24 hours or as soon as we have more information.

APNS push notifications payloads from Conversations are now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

APNS push notifications payloads from Conversations are now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.
We are investigating an issue with malformed APNS push notifications payloads from Conversations. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available
Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with APNS push notifications. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: Message Status Update Failures Affecting MMS Messages for a Subset of Customers

incident_updates.body: We continue to investigate MMS message status update failures with Programmable Messaging for a subset of customers. MMS statuses may fail to update, but MMS delivery is not affected. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to investigate MMS message status update failures with Programmable Messaging for a subset of customers. MMS statuses may fail to update, but MMS delivery is not affected. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to investigate MMS message status update failures with Programmable Messaging for a subset of customers. MMS statuses may fail to update, but MMS delivery is not affected. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating MMS message status update failures with Programmable Messaging for a subset of customers. MMS statuses may fail to update, but MMS delivery is not affected. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating MMS message status update failures with Programmable Messaging for a subset of customers. MMS statuses may fail to update, but MMS delivery is not affected. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our SMS carrier partner in the US is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 27 September 2023 at 19:00 PDT until 29 September 2023 at 02:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T US handsets via shortcode.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:
27 September 2023 at 19:00 PDT until 28 September 2023 at 02:00 PDT
28 September 2023 at 19:00 PDT until 29 September 2023 at 02:00 PDT

scheduled_maintenances.name: Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Multiple Countries

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partners Three UK, H3G Austria, and Wind (Tre) Italy are conducting a planned maintenance from 27 September 2023 at 21:30 PDT until 27 September 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three UK, H3G Austria and Wind (Tre) Italy customers.

Impacted Products:

Verify Silent Network Auth - Three UK, H3G Austria, Wind (Tre) Italy
Lookup SIM Swap - Three UK, H3G Austria, Wind (Tre) Italy
Lookup Identity Match - Three UK, Wind (Tre) Italy

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Three UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 28 September 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 01 October 2023 at 16:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three UK customers.
Impacted Products: Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match
